tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: SWEETEST PROFESSOR EVER! Lectures are very inspirational. No homework, no textbook. Short responses on BB (one each week) very simple. Takes attendance so don\'t miss class. 1.50 hr class and worth every minute-she makes time fly. Really just sit and share info about the field of education.I would absolutely take her again if I could. Well-Respected

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Although this class is 2 hours long sometimes she lets you out early. You have to keep journals (observations) on the particular class you are observing outside of the classroom. There is also weekly online writing assignments(1 page). One final and a portfolio.

stu_tags: RESPECTED  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GRADED BY FEW THINGS
comments: She is so sweet and does great lectures. You will also talk in groups about your observation. Very easy class.

comments: One of the best classes I have taken. Really easy to pass with a good grade. Take it, easy A if you go to class.

Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Great teacher and a great class! You have to observe a school in your field for a total of 45 hours (4 hours a week). You also have short weekly assignments, a journal, and a final. Easy class!

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I highly recommend taking this class if you are a freshmen. The lectures are once a week and you are required to observe at a school site for 45 hours. I did 4 hours a week and it was very simple. Mrs. Schlievert is a very easy going professor she had lectures that were conversational. We always got out early and I learned a lot. Overall easy A.

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: EASY A! Get experience!! Loved every moment. And you never stay the whole time. No textbook. final is simple. GO to every class you and do your hours in the classroom and your promised an A.

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Best teacher I have ever had! Super nice and sweet! I recommend taking her class!

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: She is a great teacher! she definitely knows all about education and teaching! Easy class and will work with you if you have any questions. Many people said her lecture is boring but its all about teaching and education,if you think thats boring maybe you need a new major.. would take this teacher again! love her!!!

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Her class is extremely easy but an overall complete waste of time. It is already required that every student complete 45 hours of observation hours a week so why am I stuck in your boring class for 3 hours a week as well. You will pass with flying colors if you take her but bring things to entertain yourself orou will be bored out of your mind.

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: This class takes up a lot of your time. You have to do 45 observation hours at a school site. The assignments are all really easy and for the final she gave all the answers so it is easy to get an A. The lectures are a huge waste of time and I didn\'t learn a whole lot but they were mandatory. Overall time consuming but easy class.

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: An easy but very time-consuming class. If you HAVE to take it, take it with her. she\'s the best and the final and assignments are VERY easy.

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: The easiest class. She gives you the answers to the final in the review. I would have got a 100% in class if i didnt get 10 points docked off of my participation for talking during class :) easy class!
